objects.text: • DIGITAL ART PRINT • VIBRANT COLORS • KITCHEN DECOR

product_details.name: Epic Food Fight: The Ultimate Kitchen Battle Art Print
product_details.description:
• High-quality digital art print featuring a whimsical food-themed battle scene
• Vibrant colors showcasing fresh vegetables and playful warrior characters
• Creative composition with a woven basket centerpiece filled with fresh produce
• Detailed illustration including broccoli, pumpkin, lettuce, and colorful vegetables
• Perfect wall decor for kitchen, dining room, or restaurant spaces
• Unique blend of fantasy and culinary art themes
• Professional-grade print quality with sharp details and rich colors
• Entertaining design that brings life and character to any food-related space
• Ideal gift for food enthusiasts, chefs, or art collectors
• Available in multiple size options to suit various display needs

banner_details:
This vibrant banner features a dynamic design evoking creativity in culinary art. At the center is an imaginative composite object (`product_image`) made of various vegetables and kitchen tools, encased in a circular frame with a green gradient edge. The composition is grounded by a smooth radial orange-to-red background (`background`) accented with subtle white decorative elements like floating lines and circles to add movement. The bold title (`heading`) appears at the top in large uppercase letters, followed by a playful, cursive subtitle (`subheading`). A bright yellow circle contains the price element (`price`) to highlight affordability. A tagline (`tagline`) with compact bullet-pointed features sits above a strong call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) in deep green.

**Color Palette:**
- Gradient Orange: `#FFA726` to `#FF5722`
- Bright Yellow: `#FFD54F` to `#FFC107`
- Lush Greens: `#43A047`, `#2E7D32`, `#4CAF50`
- White Accents: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The image features a vibrant and dynamic color palette that enhances the freshness and playfulness of the product. Dominant colors include deep green (#3B6B4C) from the leafy vegetables and broccoli, vivid orange (#F17C30) from the pumpkin, and rich purple (#4B295E) from the grapes and character. A natural brown (#B8865B) from the basket grounds the composition, while accents of red (#D44138) from the tomato and creamy whites (#F5F3E7) add contrast. Colors are skillfully blended with soft shading, highlighting texture while maintaining individual vibrancy. The palette suggests freshness, vitality, and energy — ideal for a health-focused advertisement banner.
